mapper.sql: a.order_no AS "orderNo", a.user_id AS "user.id", a.platform_order_no AS "platformOrderNo", a.original_order_price AS "originalOrderPrice", a.order_price AS "orderPrice", a.payment AS "payment", a.payment_type AS "paymentType", a.freight_price AS "freightPrice", a.total_refund_fee AS "totalRefundFee", a.title AS "title", a.body AS "body", a.status AS "status", a.apply_for_reject AS "applyForReject", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.payment_date AS "paymentDate", a.consign_date AS "consignDate", a.reject_date AS "rejectDate", a.end_date AS "endDate", a.close_date AS "closeDate", a.type AS "type", a.score_usage_num AS "scoreUsageNum", a.bounty_usage_num AS "bountyUsageNum", a.coupon_usage_num AS "couponUsageNum", a.vip_card_id AS "vipCardId", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.buyer_message AS "buyerMessage", a.shopCarIds AS "shopCarIds", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.freight_name AS "freightName", a.freight_no AS "freightNo", a.activity_id AS "activityId", a.activity_type AS "activityType", u2.name AS "user.name"
LEFT JOIN sys_user u2 ON u2.id = a.user_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wemall_order( order_no, user_id, platform_order_no, original_order_price, order_price, payment, payment_type, freight_price, total_refund_fee, title, body, status, apply_for_reject, create_date, update_date, payment_date, consign_date, reject_date, end_date, close_date, type, score_usage_num, bounty_usage_num, coupon_usage_num, vip_card_id, remarks, buyer_message, shopCarIds, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{orderNo}, #{user.id}, #{platformOrderNo}, #{originalOrderPrice}, #{orderPrice}, #{payment}, #{paymentType}, #{freightPrice}, #{totalRefundFee}, #{title}, #{body}, #{status}, #{applyForReject}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{paymentDate}, #{consignDate}, #{rejectDate}, #{endDate}, #{closeDate}, #{type}, #{scoreUsageNum}, #{bountyUsageNum}, #{couponUsageNum}, #{vipCardId}, #{remarks}, #{buyerMessage}, #{shopCarIds}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE wemall_order SET
user_id = #{user.id},
platform_order_no = #{platformOrderNo},
original_order_price = #{originalOrderPrice},
order_price = #{orderPrice},
payment = #{payment},
payment_type = #{paymentType},
freight_price = #{freightPrice},
total_refund_fee = #{totalRefundFee},
title = #{title},
body = #{body},
status = #{status},
apply_for_reject = #{applyForReject},
payment_date = #{paymentDate},
consign_date = #{consignDate},
reject_date = #{rejectDate},
end_date = #{endDate},
close_date = #{closeDate},
type = #{type},
score_usage_num = #{scoreUsageNum},
bounty_usage_num = #{bountyUsageNum},
coupon_usage_num = #{couponUsageNum},
vip_card_id = #{vipCardId},
remarks = #{remarks},
buyer_message = #{buyerMessage},
shopCarIds = #{shopCarIds},
freight_name = #{freightName},
freight_no = #{freightNo},
activity_id = #{activityId},
activity_type = #{activityType},
update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE order_no = #{orderNo}

UPDATE wemall_order SET
order_price = #{orderPrice},
payment_type = #{paymentType},
prepay_id = #{prepayId},
buyer_message = #{buyerMessage},
platform_order_no = #{platformOrderNo},
score_usage_num = #{scoreUsageNum}, bounty_usage_num = #{bountyUsageNum}, coupon_usage_num = #{couponUsageNum}, vip_card_id = #{vipCardId}, activity_id = #{activityId}, activity_type = #{activityType}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE order_no = #{orderNo}

UPDATE wemall_order SET
payment = #{payment},
payment_date = #{paymentDate},
consign_date = #{consignDate},
reject_date = #{rejectDate},
end_date = #{endDate},
close_date = #{closeDate},
freight_name = #{freightName},
freight_no = #{freightNo},
status = #{status} WHERE order_no = #{orderNo}
